entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Windsor
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:08 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 5.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Windsor Airport 3:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 5.4°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 51 %
Dewpoint: -4.0°C
Wind: ENE 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers overnight with risk of freezing rain. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early in the morning. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 50 gusting to 70 in the morning then diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy in the evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
